metadata.name: For The Valiant Soul
metadata.description:
What men call luck is the prerogative of valiant soul, fealty life pays it's rightful king."
James Russell Lowell 1844

This body of work is my first trial at virtual photography, I dream about traveling around the world, photographing and experiencing different cultures, while my journey progresses and that dream seemingly on hold, virtual photography have provided me the opportunity to photograph my muses who are miles away from me.
As challenging as it might sound it was really interesting and educative.
The brave step towards having an experience of virtual photography birthed this masterpiece.

shot via shuttersapp


License: Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The license includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works.
